A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible movie. Turned Star Wars into a Marvel film. Primary plot device is a spaceship running out of fuel. Character development from the previous The Force Awakens movie is a complete let down. Movies are only as good as their villains\, and TLJ completely succeeds in making its villains bland and uninteresting. Overall a plodding and disjointed movie very different from TFA and Rogue One (both of which I enjoyed).
